mapper.insert: insert into board (bno, title, content, writer) values ( (select nvl(max(bno)+1,1) from board), #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, b.regdate, content, viewcnt, name, writer from board b, member m where b.writer = m.userid and bno=#{bno}
mapper.update: update board set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where bno=#{bno}
